resources.string: Captive Portal Controller cannot be enabled unless it can write to Android settings. To do this, run the following command in a root or ADB shell:
You may have to re-enable networking (Wi-Fi/Mobile network) to see the changes.
Start typing http to see suggestions.
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/60.0.3112.32 Safari/537.36
A fixed and widely-used user agent such as the one specified in the field below improves your privacy.
The NTP/SNTP server is used when the OS is unable to update time using the mobile network. In most OS, this fallback method is used even when automatic time update is disabled in Settings.
